content: knitted drops dog s jumper for valentine with hearts in karisma drops extra 0-1010 drops design pattern no u-699 yarn group b size xs - s - m - l dog s measurements chest width approx 28/32 - 40/44 - 50/54 - 60/66 cm / 11 /12½ - 15¾ /17¼ - 19¾ /21¼ - 23½ /26 back length approx 24/26 - 32/34 - 40/42 - 48/52 cm / 9½ /10¼ - 12½ /13½ - 15¾ /16½ - 19 /20½ example of dog races xs = chihuahua s = bichon frisé m = cocker spaniel l = irish setter materials drops karisma from garnstudio 100-100-150-200 g color no 48 wine red 50-50-50-50 g color no 01 off white 50-50-50-50 g color no 33 medium pink drops double pointed needles for size xs circular needle 40 cm / 16 for size s and m and 60 cm / 24 for size l size 3 5 mm / us 4 or size needed to get 22 sts x 30 row in stockinette st = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 drops double pointed needles all sizes and circular needle 40 cm / 16 for size s and m and 60 cm / 24 for size l size 3 mm /us 2 5 - for rib worked in the round on double pointed needles/circular needle from the neck down the smallest size is worked on double pointed needles the other sizes on circular needle
